message_1: What is the maximum amount of potassium nitrate that can dissolve in 100 mL of water at 25°C?
message_2: The solubility of potassium nitrate (KNO₃) in water varies with temperature. At 25°C, the solubility of potassium nitrate is approximately 37 grams per 100 mL of water. Therefore, the maximum amount of potassium nitrate that can dissolve in 100 mL of water at 25°C is 37 grams.
